General.Name: TSI Co. Ltd.
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: TSI Co., Ltd., a mixing system company, manufactures and sells rechargeable battery mixing systems in South Korea, the United States, China, and Europe. The company offers integrated mixing solutions, including procurement and equipment manufacturing, mixing room layout design and structure construction, piping and wiring, equipment installation, customer MES linkage, and finishing services; and Planetary Despa (PD) mixer. It also provides Corona Mix for manufacturing slurry for secondary batteries; Solu Mix, an equipment to dissolve PVDF and CMC; and powder transfer system, a device that transfers active material powder using a vacuum pump. TSI Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Hwaseong, South Korea.
